Package com.java.controller.map

Class MapEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.controller.map.MapEditor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapCreator
    public class MapEditor
extends java.lang.Object
    MapEditor implements the logic to make it possible for a user to edit an already loaded map into the game.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Karan Dhingra, Ghalia Elkerdi, Sahil Singh Sodhi, Cristian Rodriguez
